thread.section_title: David Sklar & Associates Inc. Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of David Sklar & Associates Inc. | davidsklar.com
thread.title: Allan
thread.title_full: David Sklar & Associates Inc. reviewed by Allan

author: Allan
title: Allan
text:
I am very pleased with the service that I received during this difficult time.
The process has been fully explained to me and any questions have been answered fully.
After an office visit, I feel much better and the enthusiasm of my councelor
is contagious. She is very upbeat which make me feel better.
